title: Collaborative Workshop for Enhancing Managerial Accounting Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic accounting terminology and experience in financial statement analysis
context.additional_context: Cultivating applied managerial accounting skills through small-group collaboration and real-world case analysis in a BYOD environment, with a focus on decision-making simulations for manager/leader roles

learning_goals: Participants can explain cost allocation and budgeting processes by analyzing real corporate cases
Learners collaborate in small groups to create product profitability analysis reports and finalize presentation materials
Trainees can evaluate three or more strategic decision-making scenarios using managerial accounting information
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
